SELECT t.F_ID, t.OPT_ID, t.OPT_NAME, t.OPT_ICON, t.OPT_ORDER, t.OPT_VISIBLE, t.OPT_PERMS, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(x.PERMS) FROM SYS_AUTHZ_ROLE_PERMS x WHERE x.R_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ( x.PERMS = t.OPT_PERMS or x.PERMS = '*' or x.PERMS = '*:*') ) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OPT_CHECKED FROM SYS_FEATURE_OPTS t
